description: Refactor Version and Constraint types from struct-based interpretation to interface-based behavior encapsulation with explicit error handling

userStories.title: Add Version constructor and ToString method
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to create Version instances from strings and get string representation.
acceptanceCriteria: NewVersion accepts non-semver strings: main, abc123def
NewVersion returns error for empty string
ToString returns original string with v prefix if present
ToString works for both semver and non-semver versions

userStories.title: Add Version comparison methods
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to compare two semver versions to determine ordering.
acceptanceCriteria: CompareTo returns -1 when self is older than other
CompareTo returns 0 when self equals other
CompareTo returns 1 when self is newer than other
CompareTo returns error when either version is non-semver
Comparison uses major → minor → patch ordering
Both methods return error when either version is non-semver

userStories.title: Add Constraint constructor and ToString method
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to create Constraint instances from semver strings.
acceptanceCriteria: NewConstraint returns error for non-semver strings
ToString returns original string with v, ^, ~ prefix if present

userStories.title: Add Constraint satisfaction check method
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to check if a version satisfies a constraint.
acceptanceCriteria: IsSatisfiedBy returns true for Latest constraint with any semver
IsSatisfiedBy checks exact match for Exact constraint
IsSatisfiedBy checks major version range for Major constraint
IsSatisfiedBy checks minor version range for Minor constraint
IsSatisfiedBy returns error when version is non-semver

userStories.title: Update ResolveVersion function
userStories.description: As a developer, I want ResolveVersion to use new Version methods.

userStories.title: Update helpers package
userStories.description: As a developer, I want helper functions to use new Version/Constraint methods.
acceptanceCriteria: Update helper functions to use NewVersion and NewConstraint
Handle error returns from new methods

userStories.title: Update storage package
userStories.description: As a developer, I want storage package to use new constructors.
acceptanceCriteria: Uses NewVersion constructor in package.go and storage.go
Handles error returns from new methods

userStories.title: Update manifest manager
userStories.description: As a developer, I want manifest manager to use new constructors.
acceptanceCriteria: Handles error returns from new methods

userStories.title: Update package lock manager
userStories.description: As a developer, I want package lock manager to use new constructors.
acceptanceCriteria: Handles error returns from new methods

userStories.title: Update sink manager
userStories.description: As a developer, I want sink manager to use new constructors.
acceptanceCriteria: Handles error returns from new methods
